description: Detects the use of Fast Reverse Proxy. frp is a fast reverse proxy to help you expose a local server behind a NAT or firewall to the Internet.
author: frack113
Florian Roth
name: PUA - Fast Reverse Proxy (FRP) Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:("*\\frpc.exe" OR "*\\frps.exe")) OR (process.command_line.text:"*\\frpc.ini*") OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=7D9C233B8C9E3F0EA290D2B84593C842* OR *SHA1\=06DDC9280E1F1810677935A2477012960905942F* OR *SHA256\=57B0936B8D336D8E981C169466A15A5FD21A7D5A2C7DAF62D5E142EE860E387C*)) OR (md5:"7d9c233b8c9e3f0ea290d2b84593c842") OR (sha1:"06ddc9280e1f1810677935a2477012960905942f") OR (sha256:"57b0936b8d336d8e981c169466a15a5fd21a7d5a2c7daf62d5e142ee860e387c"))
